      • setVipWithTest

        public java.lang.String setVipWithTest()
        Method that sets ad priority as VIP and adds test option to it. Method redirects the user to ad creation page where number of test questions are to be assigned.
        Returns:
        Redirect to ad creating page

      • activeAdvertsAndRedirect

        public java.lang.String activeAdvertsAndRedirect()
        Searches for active advertisement by given username and redirect
        Returns:
        The View with the ads of the given company

      • setVipWithoutTest

        public java.lang.String setVipWithoutTest()
        Method that sets ad priority as VIP but disables the "test" option. Method redirects the user to ad creation page.
        Returns:
        Redirect to ad creating page

      • setRegularAd

        public java.lang.String setRegularAd()
        Sets the ad as regular, no test and VIP options. Method redirects the user to ad creation page.
        Returns:
        Redirect to ad creating page

      • saveNewAd

        public java.lang.String saveNewAd()
        Method that makes the queries to the database and finally creates a whole new ad. Redirects to message page, showing status of creating and saving the new ad.
        Returns:
        Redirect to status page, displaying ad creation status

      • setQuestions

        public java.lang.String setQuestions()
        Creates an array list with the size of the selected number of questions for the test. The number is selected by user in xhtml file. Method also adds count number values to each question. Redirects to "enter_questions.xhtml" where user can assign the question's text accordingly to number
        Returns:
        Redirect to question submitting page

      • saveInDB

        public java.lang.String saveInDB()
        Creates an JSONArray with JSON objects, containing at one side the question number and at the other side the question itself. Method redirects to the rest of the creating ad process page.
        Returns:
        Redirect to ad creation page

      • getShowAllPlaces

        public java.util.List<javax.faces.model.SelectItem> getShowAllPlaces()
        Method that generates the content in the selection menus, containing all possible cities available, during ad creation process.
        Returns:
        list of places available, retrieved from database
